channel.title: SMF 75 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 75 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: SMF 75 Subtype 1
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF75PRO SMF75PSD Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp date time Record Timestamp boost_class fla Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format date SMF75DTE Date of Record date time SMF75TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual date time Record Timestamp len SMF75LEN SMF RECORD LENGTH. integer seg SMF75SEG SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR integer flg flag SMF75FLG SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS string rrf flg NEW RECORD FORMAT sut flg SUBTYPES USED v4 flg MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa flg MVS/ESA IF ON vxa flg MVS/XA IF ON os flg OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy flg SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE rty SMF75RTY RECORD TYPE integer tme SMF75TME TOD RECORD WRITTEN time dte SMF75DTE DATE RECORD WRITTEN date sid SMF75SID SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION string ssi SMF75SSI SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) string sty SMF75STY SUBTYPE integer trn SMF75TRN NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC integer prs SMF75PRS OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION integer prl SMF75PRL LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION integer prn SMF75PRN NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS integer pss SMF75PSS OFFSET TO PAGE DATA SECTION integer psl SMF75PSL LENGTH OF PAGE DATA SECTION integer psn SMF75PSN NUMBER OF PAGE DATA SECTIONS integer Maps and sections SMF75PRO RMF Product Section

item.title: Field - arch_mode
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - avu
item.description: AVG NUMBER OF SLOTS USED Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75AVU

item.title: Field - bds
item.description: NUMBER OF UNUSABLE SLOTS Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75BDS

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF75S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - com
item.description: COMMON Map: SMF75PSD Based on: pst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field pst.

item.title: Field - cu
item.description: CONTROL UNIT NAME (EBCDIC). Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75CU Description VALID ONLY WHEN SMF75SCM IS OFF

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75DAT

item.title: Field - dat_facility1
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dat_facility2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75DTE

item.title: Field - dev
item.description: DEVICE NAME (EBCDIC). Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75DEV Description VALID ONLY WHEN SMF75SCM IS OFF

item.title: Field - device_name_valid
item.description: DEVICE NAME PROVIDED IN FIELD SMF75DEV IS VALID Map: SMF75PSD Based on: fl2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fl2.

item.title: Field - device_numbers
item.description: Device number - from UCBCHAN Format “HHHH” for 4 digit devices VALID ONLY WHEN SMF75SCM IS OFF Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75CHA

item.title: Field - device_type
item.description: DEVICE TYPE. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75TYP Description VALID ONLY WHEN SMF75SCM IS OFF

item.title: Field - ds_accepts_vio
item.description: DATASET ACCEPTS VIO PAGES Map: SMF75PSD Based on: fl2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fl2.

item.title: Field - ds_on_alt_control_unit
item.description: DATASET IS ON A DEVICE WITH AN ALTERNATE CONTROL UNIT Map: SMF75PSD Based on: fl2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fl2.

item.title: Field - dsb
item.description: DS BAD Map: SMF75PSD Based on: pst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field pst.

item.title: Field - dsn
item.description: PAGE DATA SET NAME. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75DSN Description VALID ONLY WHEN SMF75SCM IS OFF

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75DTE

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF75S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - escon_ch
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - escon_dir
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - expanded_stor
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - fl2
item.description: Flags Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75FL2 Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ds_accepts_vio 0 DATASET ACCEPTS VIO PAGES ds_on_alt_control_unit 2 DATASET IS ON A DEVICE WITH AN ALTERNATE CONTROL UNIT device_name_valid 3 DEVICE NAME PROVIDED IN FIELD SMF75DEV IS VALID page_space_scm 4 Page Space Type SCM

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 invalid_samples 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III interval_smf_control 3 Interval was under SMF control lower_service_level 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. higher_service_level 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75GIE

item.title: Field - higher_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75IET

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75INT

item.title: Field - interval_smf_control
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - invalid_samples
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75LGO

item.title: Field - loc
item.description: LOCAL Map: SMF75PSD Based on: pst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field pst.

item.title: Field - lower_service_level
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - lpa
item.description: PLPA Map: SMF75PSD Based on: pst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field pst.

item.title: Field - lvu
item.description: Average number of slots used (same as SMF75AVU) (long floating point) Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75LVU

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75MFV

item.title: Field - mnu
item.description: MIN NUMBER OF SLOTS USED Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75MNU

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75MVS

item.title: Field - mxu
item.description: MAX NUMBER OF SLOTS USED Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75MXU

item.title: Field - ofl
item.description: DS VARIED OFFLINE DURING INTERVAL. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: pst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field pst.

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75OIL

item.title: Field - onl
item.description: DS VARIED ONLINE DURING INTERVAL Map: SMF75PSD Based on: pst Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field pst.

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF75S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - page_space_scm
item.description: Page Space Type SCM Map: SMF75PSD Based on: fl2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fl2.

item.title: Field - pgx
item.description: NO. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75PGX Description PAGES TRANSFERRED TO DATA SET

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description expanded_stor 0 System has expanded storage escon_ch 1 Equipped with ESCON channel escon_dir 2 ESCON Director in configuration arch_mode 3 System in z/ARCH mode zaap_inst 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed ziip_inst 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed dat_facility1 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 dat_facility2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75PRN

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75PRS

item.title: Field - psl
item.description: LENGTH OF PAGE DATA SECTION Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75PSL

item.title: Field - psn
item.description: NUMBER OF PAGE DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75PSN

item.title: Field - pss
item.description: OFFSET TO PAGE DATA SECTION Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75PSS

item.title: Field - pst
item.description: PAGE SPACE TYPE Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75PST Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lpa 0 PLPA com 1 COMMON loc 3 LOCAL dsb 5 DS BAD onl 6 DS VARIED ONLINE DURING INTERVAL ofl 7 DS VARIED OFFLINE DURING INTERVAL.

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75PTN

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75RAO

item.title: Field - req
item.description: TOTAL NUMBER OF REQUESTS FOR THIS DATASET SEEN BY ALL SAMPLES. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75REQ Description EQUAL TO SMF75USE

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF75S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75SAM

item.title: Field - scs
item.description: Subchannel Set ID. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75SCS Description VALID ONLY WHEN SMF75SCM IS OFF

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75SID

item.title: Field - sio
item.description: NO. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75SIO Description SIO(S) TO DATA SET

item.title: Field - sla
item.description: Total number of slots contained within page data set Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75SLA

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75SNM

item.title: Field - speed_boost
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF75S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF75S1 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF75S1 Based on: SMF75TRN

item.title: Field - use
item.description: NO. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75USE Description TIMES DS IN USE BY ASM

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF75S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vol
item.description: VOLUME SERIAL. Map: SMF75PSD Based on: SMF75VOL Description VALID ONLY WHEN SMF75SCM IS OFF

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF75S1 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF75PRO Based on: SMF75XNM

item.title: Field - zaap_inst
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ziip_boost
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF75PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ziip_inst
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF75PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.
